about_the_game:
Join our Discord community or follow us on Twitter to interact with other players, and get the latest updates and support from our circle! We provide responses and support for all players who post questions!


Story

As an adventurer who travels with a pact devil,
the player and his girlfriend, Ria Astraea, arrive in the Kul Village.
Because the "currency" needed to establish the pact is getting low,
Ria is forced to consider organizing a business contest
for you and another powerful adventurer in Kul Town, Bob—
A business competition lasting five days
to decide who will be the next pact holder.
So, who will win in this contest of "hunting skills" and "patience"?

Game Features

This title is an NTRPG (Netorare Role-Playing Game) focused on the male protagonist's perspective.
Unlike direct narration of NTR from the female lead's point of view, players engage in a strategic battle with a third-party character.
Players must simultaneously hinder the third party's actions while completing competition objectives.
Additionally, the game dynamically reflects the female lead's status in her character art, adding a unique thrill.
Nevertheless, pure love is still possible! As long as complete NTR hasn't occurred, there's a chance for redemption.
Depending on daily actions and managing various stats, different endings and corresponding post-story content are unlocked.
Can you and Ria achieve the ending you desire?

Game Mechanics

・5 distinctively styled large exploration maps.
・Unpredictable competitors requiring constant vigilance.
・High-quality ASMR voice acting, best experienced in sync with real-world time.
・An extensive event branching and stat management system.
・Multiple endings determined by various stats, each with corresponding follow-up stories.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

- Lewd jokes & dialog
- Nudity

All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

  • OS *: Windows 7 or later

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce™ GTX 640 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

Recommended:

short_description: Traveling with Ria, a devil contracted as both a companion and girlfriend, the protagonist faces her disdain due to a mundane lifestyle. They encounter a powerful adventurer, leading to an odd five-day competition where the winner becomes Ria's new contractor.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
